H0.text: The number of mitochondria provides a specialized stem cell with its shape, which research has shown helps drive specialization into specific cell types.

H1.text: The presence of a nucleus provides a specialized cell with its shape, as research has shown that the specialization of stem cells into specific cell types results, in part, from cell shape.

H2.text: The structure of the cytoskeleton provides a specialized cell with its shape, contributing to the specialization of stem cells into specific cell types.

H3.text: The salt concentration of cytoplasm provides a specialized cell with its shape, thereby contributing to the specialization of stem cells into specific cell types.

A4.text: Its primary function is to give the cell its shape and mechanical resistance to deformation
